Server GUI modules documentation¶

add_user.py¶

The module describes the add user window.

class server.gui.add_user.AddUserWindow(server, database)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDialog

The class is a dialog for registering a user on the server.

save_data()¶

The method checks the correctness of the input and saves the new user in the database.

config_window.py¶

The module describes the server GUI settings window.

class server.gui.config_window.ConfigWindow¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDialog

The class describes the settings window.

initUI()¶

The method creates interface elements of the main window.

open_path_select()¶

The handler method opens the path selection window.

del_user.py¶

The module describes the user deletion window.

class server.gui.del_user.DeleteUserWindow(server, database)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDialog

Class - dialog for selecting a contact to delete.

drop_menu_fill()¶

The method fills the dropdown menu.

remove_user()¶

Method handler deletion. Checks if the client is connected and closes the connection, also deleting it from the database.

main_window.py¶

The module describes the main window.

class server.gui.main_window.MainWindow(server, database)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow

Class - the main window of the server.

del_user_window()¶

The method calls the user deletion window.

gui_active_users()¶

The method creates a table of active users for display in the program window.

Returns

class instance QStandardItemModel.

reg_user_window()¶

The method calls the user registration window.

Messenger
